title: Slate Money: Travel
description:
Cathy O'Neil joins Felix on the inaugural episode of this new mini series from Slate Money all about travel. Felix and Cathy talk overtravel; the joylessness of business class, alcohol on planes, optimization, and peanut butter crackers.
Mathbabe’s Guide to Overtravel 
Email: slatemoney@slate.com
Twitter: @felixsalmon,@mathbabedotorg
Podcast production by Max Jacobs.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
